text: Gei mee ga helekai aga i mua nia daangada huogodoo aalaa bolo Dimaadua gu helekai boloo, “Deenei dagu hai dela e oho ai di mee aamo a di King Nebuchadnezzar dela guu wanga gi hongo nia uwa o nia henua huogodoo. Gei Mee gaa hai di mee deenei i lodo nia ngadau e lua.” Gei au ga hagatanga gaa hana.
